short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple and clean calculator extension for your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Looking for a simple and clean calculator extension for your Chrome browser? Look no further! Our extension provides a quick and easy way to perform basic arithmetic operations without leaving your current web page. It's perfect for students, professionals, and anyone who needs to perform quick calculations while browsing the web.

Our calculator extension is intuitive and easy to use. Simply click on the calculator icon in your browser toolbar to open the calculator window, enter your calculation, and hit the equals button to get your answer. You can also your keyboard keys to control the calculator extension.

Install our calculator extension today and always have a calculator at hand!
